headline: Does onsemi’s New FORVIA HELLA MOSFET Deal Reshape the Bull Case for ON Semiconductor (ON)?
summary: In December 2025, onsemi announced an expanded long-term engagement with FORVIA HELLA, which will adopt onsemi’s PowerTrench T10 MOSFET technology across advanced automotive platforms, with production at onsemi’s East Fishkill, New York facility. The deal highlights how onsemi’s shielded gate trench MOSFETs, with lower losses and higher power density, could help FORVIA HELLA design more efficient and cost-effective electronic systems for a wide range of vehicle applications.
